CustomField.description: Specify the ordering of the columns along with headers and fields. The columns and fields will render based on how they are ordered. See help text for example.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Ex:{"Opportunity":{"Gift":{"BLANK_1":[{"Field__c":"write"},{"BLANK":"read"}],"Header":[{"Field__c":"write"}]}}. Unique BLANK_# for no column header; use BLANK for blank fields. To use the same customization for Opportunities, omit record type map.
CustomField.label: Custom Display Field Orders
